TunableTuple.name: BUILD_OBJECTS_ENVIRONMENT_SCORING
TunableTuple.description: Defines the statistics which track the value of positive and negative environmental contribution from build objects.

Tunable.name: DISABLE_AFFORDANCE
Tunable.description: The interaction that will turn off Environment Score for a particular object. This interaction should set a state on the object that will have multipliers of 0 and adders of 0 for all moods.

Tunable.name: DISABLED_STATE_VALUE
Tunable.description: A state value that indicates the object should not be contributing Environment Score.

Tunable.name: ENABLE_AFFORDANCE
Tunable.description: The interaction that will turn on Environment Score for a particular object. This interaction should set a state on the object that will have multipliers of 1 and adders of 0 for all moods.

Tunable.name: ENABLED_STATE_VALUE
Tunable.description: A state value that indicates the object should be contributing Environment Score.

Tunable.name: ENVIRONMENT_SCORE_BROADCASTER
Tunable.description: The singleton broadcaster that groups all scoring objects. The constraints on this broadcaster determine the constraint within which a Sim is affected by environment score.

TunableList.name: ENVIRONMENT_SCORE_MOODS
TunableList.description: Tags on Objects correspond to a particular Mood. When an object is going to contribute to the environment score, put a tag in it's catalog object, and make sure that tag points to a Mood here.

Tunable.name: mood
Tunable.description: The mood that the Sim must be in for an object that emits this mood to score. Corresponds to the mood_tag.

TunableEnum.name: object_tag
TunableEnum.description: The Tag that corresponds to mood and environmental scoring data.

Tunable.name: NEGATIVE_ENVIRONMENT_SCORING
Tunable.description: Defines the ranges and corresponding buffs to apply for negative environmental contribution. Be sure to tune min, max, and the different states. The convergence value is what will remove the buff. Suggested to be 0.

Tunable.name: POSITIVE_ENVIRONMENT_SCORING
Tunable.description: Defines the ranges and corresponding buffs to apply for positive environmental contribution. Be sure to tune min, max, and the different states. The convergence value is what will remove the buff. Suggested to be 0.
